Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Kama = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
local sliceAnim local spinAnim local spinning
local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0
local runService = game:service("RunService")
local kamaAOE = Vector3.new(7, 7, 7)
local animating = false
local torsoFrame = {}
function slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso)
laughSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("EvilLaugh") if laughSound then laughSound:Play() end
bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, bg.P, bg.P) bg.Name = "BG"
torsoFrame[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoFrame[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bg.Parent = myTorso
for i = 1, 84 do local c = i%6 + 1 if bg then bg.cframe = torsoFrame[c] end wait(0.025) end
if bg then bg:Remove() end wait(2.0) end
function sliceAndDice(key) key = key:lower() if key == "w" then t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
spinning = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spinning") if spinning and spinning.Value == 1 then return end
t = runService.Stepped:wait() if t - dashTime < 0.2 then spinAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SpinAnim) if spinAnim then spinAnim:Play() end slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) wait(0.25) animating = false else sliceAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SliceAnim) if sliceAnim then sliceAnim:Play() end wait(0.6) animating = false end wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") mouse.KeyDown:connect(sliceAndDice) end end
function onUnequipped() if sliceAnim then sliceAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Kama = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local leftKama local leftKamaWeld
local slashSound
local leftKamaConnection
Tool.Enabled = true
local kamaDamage = 20
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Name = "creator" debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function slash(hit, arm, kamaHandle) local armWeld if hit and hit.Parent and vCharacter then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~=nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then if arm == nil then arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") end if arm then armWeld = arm:FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") or arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if armWeld and (armWeld.Part0 == kamaHandle or armWeld.Part1 == kamaHandle) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(kamaDamage) end end end end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myLeftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if myTorso and myLeftArm and vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftKama") == nil and leftKamaWeld == nil then leftKama = Kama:Clone() leftKama.Name = "LeftKama" leftKama.Parent = vCharacter
leftKamaWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftKamaWeld.Part0 = myLeftArm leftKamaWeld.Part1 = leftKama leftKamaWeld.C1 = (CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(0, -math.pi/2, 0) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0)) + Vector3.new(-1.7, -3, 0) leftKamaWeld.Parent = myLeftArm leftKamaWeld.Name = "LeftGrip"
leftKamaConnection = leftKama.Touched:connect(function(hit) slash(hit, myLeftArm, leftKama) end) end end
function onUnequipped() if leftKama then leftKama:Remove() leftKama = nil end if leftKamaWeld then leftKamaWeld:Remove() leftKamaWeld = nil end if slashSound then slashSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Kama.Touched:connect(function(hit) slash(hit, nil, Kama) end)
